>
[First Frost](/Feats.aspx?ID=4096) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 185 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Gelid Shard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=201)

</column>

---

The [_gelid shard_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2369) within your heart may sap your ability to feel and experience emotion, but it also lets you create and manipulate cold. You learn to cast arcane [spontaneous spells](/Rules.aspx?ID=2224), and you gain a spell repertoire with the [_frostbite_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1539) and [_frost’s touch_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1274) (see below) cantrips. You’re trained in spell attack modifier and spell DC. Your key spellcasting attribute is Charisma.
